description:
Ichigo and his friends manage to drive away Grimmjow and the other Arrancars. But behind the scenes, Aizen orders Ulquiorra to bring Orihime to Hueco Mundo. Orihime agrees to go in exchange for the safety of her friends. She is given a twelve-hour reprieve and is allowed to say her farewells to only one person. Orihime prepares herself and leaves her room to say goodbye to the one person she has in mind. Meanwhile, Hitsugaya and the others are recovering from the injuries they received from their fight with the Arrancars.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: さよなら..., 黒崎くん
